name: The Robot Killers
description:
Supports Both Keyboard & Controller The Robot Killers

This game was a game I made in a week. The Robot Killers is a local-multiplayer game up to 4 players. Play with your friends to achieve the highest score possible TOGETHER :D

For this game, I focused on creating AI & pathfinding for the enemies, creating 3D models such as the environment and enemies and also rigging the enemy to create its running cycle. I also focused on creating an FPS controller which uses raycasting to shoot instead of projectiles.

Defeat enemies and try and get the highest score possible. Difficult enemies reward better scores than others.

Mechanics InputOutputMoveWASDJumpSpaceDouble JumpSpace while in the airSprintLeft Shift
